tasks.label: Restart em_clock service
tasks.command: ssh patch@patchbox.local 'systemctl --user daemon-reload && systemctl --user restart em_clock'

tasks.label: Restart em_sys service
tasks.command: ssh patch@patchbox.local 'systemctl --user daemon-reload && systemctl --user restart em_sys'

tasks.label: Restart em_midisetup service
tasks.command: ssh patch@patchbox.local 'systemctl --user daemon-reload && systemctl --user restart em_midisetup'

tasks.label: Enable em_midisetup service
tasks.command: ssh patch@patchbox.local 'ln -s /home/patch/repos/emsys/serv/em_midisetup.service /home/patch/.config/systemd/user/em_midisetup.service && systemctl --user daemon-reload && systemctl --user enable em_midisetup'

tasks.label: Enable em_sys service
tasks.command: ssh patch@patchbox.local 'ln -s /home/patch/repos/emsys/serv/em_sys.service /home/patch/.config/systemd/user/em_sys.service && systemctl --user daemon-reload && systemctl --user enable em_sys'

tasks.label: Enable em_clock service
tasks.command: ssh patch@patchbox.local 'ln -s /home/patch/repos/emsys/serv/em_clock.service /home/patch/.config/systemd/user/em_clock.service && systemctl --user daemon-reload && systemctl --user enable em_clock'

tasks.label: Stop all services
tasks.command: ssh patch@patchbox.local 'systemctl --user daemon-reload && systemctl --user stop em_clock; systemctl --user stop em_sys; systemctl --user stop em_midisetup'

tasks.label: Disable & stop all services
tasks.command: ssh patch@patchbox.local 'systemctl --user daemon-reload && systemctl --user stop em_clock; systemctl --user stop em_sys; systemctl --user stop em_midisetup; systemctl --user disable em_clock; systemctl --user disable em_sys; systemctl --user disable em_midisetup'

tasks.label: Restart all services
tasks.command: ssh patch@patchbox.local 'systemctl --user daemon-reload && systemctl --user restart em_clock; systemctl --user restart em_sys; systemctl --user restart em_midisetup'

tasks.label: Enable all services
tasks.command: ssh patch@patchbox.local 'ln -s /home/patch/repos/emsys/serv/em_clock.service /home/patch/.config/systemd/user/em_clock.service; ln -s /home/patch/repos/emsys/serv/em_sys.service /home/patch/.config/systemd/user/em_sys.service; ln -s /home/patch/repos/emsys/serv/em_midisetup.service /home/patch/.config/systemd/user/em_midisetup.service; systemctl --user daemon-reload; systemctl --user enable em_clock; systemctl --user enable em_sys; systemctl --user enable em_midisetup'
